EmailTemplate.name: Aero MSPAvionics Renewal 10days
EmailTemplate.subject: Urgent Action Needed: MSP Avionics/Mechanical Components Renewal due soon.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued Customer,
This is your final reminder that your MSP Avionics/Mechanical contract 4400XXXXX expiration date is a few days away and you will no longer have coverage as of XX.XX.20XX.
As stated previously also not renewing your contract on time will subject your renewal to current year pricing.
Thank you for doing business with us, your case tracking number for this renewal is provided above. You may reply to this email - please leave the reference Case # within the subject line for quicker responses.
To access our Portal and view contracts click on any of these options: Register, Reset Password, Tool Access
Kind regards,
__________________Q Honeywell
MSP Avionics & Mechanical Contract Administration MSPAvionics@honeywell.com
